Class PlayerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mateus.towerdefense.view.entities.PlayerView

extends java.lang.Object
    The view of the player.

        Creates a view belonging to a game.

        game - the game this view belongs to. Needed to access the asset manager to get textures.

      • createSprite

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite createSprite(TowerDefenseGame game)
        Abstract method that creates the view sprite. Concrete implementation should extend this method to create their own sprites.
        Parameters:
        game - the game this view belongs to. Needed to access the asset manager to get textures.
        Returns:
        The sprite representing this view.
